room_title: Escape room "Mummy's Curse" by Ocean State Escape in Providence
room_description:
The Egyptian exhibit at the museum just got a whole lot weirder.


The sign by the coffin said “do not touch” but you just couldn’t resist. Now a 4,000-year-old mummy has trapped you in the museum and you have only one hour to return him to his coffin before he’s free from his eternal slumber for good…
